Package editor

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddFilesListener
    A JDialog that has the functionality of adding new files and updating the UI
    ApplyTemplateListener
    A window that performs the applying template functionality
    AquaBarTabbedPaneUI
    An AquaBarTabbedPaneUI
    BasicEDFPane
    A Base pane for the working area, to be extended for different tab type
    CheckBoxList
    A customized JList containing items of check boxes
    CPCAdapter
    This class is to implement Cut/Copy/Paste and Redo/Undo functionalities.
    CWTabbedPaneUI
    An implementation of the TabbedPaneUI that looks like the tabs that were used in the older versions of the Codewarrior IDE.
    DiscardChangesListener
    A ActionListener that discard changes made in the working area
    EDFEditorHelp
    Reads the data that comprises the help system
    EDFInfoPane
    This class is to customize the layout of info panes including the file information pane, the log pane, and the message pane To be customized items: foreground/background color/font, keyword color/font, plain text color/font, and so on.
    EDFTabbedPane
    An EDF tabbed pane for holding different header table
    EDFTreeNode
    A tree node representing an EDF file
    EDFUndoManager
    A undo manager used for EDF editing
    EIATemplatePane
    A BasicEDFPane for creating or modifying EIATemplate
    ErrorFixTemplatePane
    The UI part of the "Fix EDF Header Errors" functionality
    ESATemplatePane
    Creates and sets up the layout of an ESA template table
    ExcludeFileListener
    An action listener used for remove or delete nodes in the task navigation area
    Main  
    MainWindow  
    MainWindow.VerifyHeaderListener
    An ActionListener that verifies header information and generates report
    ModernTabbedPaneUI
    A modern tabbed pane UI
    NewTask_for_ValidityCommandLine
    This class is used for creating new task for selecting EDF files to a new task
    PSTabbedPaneUI
    An implementation of the TabbedPaneUI that looks like the tabs that are used the Photoshop palette windows.
    RenameFileListener
    An ActionListener for renaming a file
    SaveListener
    An ActionListener handles saving changes occurred in the working area
    TabbedPaneListener
    A listener listens responsible for disabling or enabling different buttons according to different pane selected
    TaskTree
    A TaskTree represents the tree structure of related EDF, EIA and ESA files shown in the Task Navigator.
    TransducerListener
    A JDialog that used for editing transducer type
    Utility
    Utility class used for general purpose
    WorkingTablePane
    This class serves two-fold purposes: create a panel to tabbed pane which contains table and a log TextArea customize the table.
